name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-sharepoint-list-update-created-by
title: Update Created by in a Microsoft List
shortDescription: This Power Automate flow updates the “Created By” field of a Microsoft List item, replacing the account with a specified user based on their email address, using an HTTP request to SharePoint.
longDescription: This Power Automate flow updates the “Created By” field of a Microsoft List item, replacing the account with a specified user based on their email address, using an HTTP request to SharePoint.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
